title: Airpods 2 Connection Issues After Updating to Android 11
content:
I've been using my Airpods 2 for months now with my Pixel 4 XL and relatively no issues. But ever since I upgraded to Android 11 I've been having these issues:

Frequently get randomly disconnected.
When connected, volume cannot be changed (remains at the same level or comepltely mute).

And this is happening to my Airpods only, I keep having to upair-pair every time. No issues with my car bluetooth.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
